original_text: When the enemy came, all your leaders ran far away. The enemy caught all your people. They caught them all and they did not need to shoot any arrows!
korean_text: 너의 관원들도 다 함께 도망하였다가 활을 버리고 결박을 당하였고 너의 멀리 도망한 자들도 발견되어 다 함께 결박을 당하였도다

sentences.original_text: all your leaders ran far away
The enemy caught all your people
and they did not need to shoot any arrows
